participant_1.background:
I am passionate about spending time with my family, no matter how old we are.
My dog has been my best companion since we got her.
I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you!
I am a disappointment to my family but I find solace in reading fiction.
I'm not sure if I'll ever know my ethnic background, but I'm happy with the family I've found.

content.text: Hey there!  How's it going?
Hi there!  Not bad, just looking for some new friends.
I know that feeling!  I'm always looking for new people to chat with.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read and spend time with my family.
I love to read too!  What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read all kinds of books, but I'm really into historical fiction and fantasy right now.
I'm not a big fan of fantasy, but I love historical fiction!  What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I'm really into the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon right now.  Have you read it?
No, but I've heard great things about it!  I'll have to check it out.
You should!  It's really good.  What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I really like the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about that series too!  I'll have to check it out.  What about you, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, play video games, and watch movies.
Me too!  I love all of those things.  What are some of your favorite movies?
I love the Lord of the Rings and Harry Potter series.
Me too!  I'm so excited for the new Lord of the Rings series on Amazon Prime.
Me too!  I can't wait to see it!
Have you seen the new Star Wars movie?
No, I haven't had a chance to yet.  Is it good?
I thought it was really good!  It's different from the other movies, but I still enjoyed it.
I'll have to check it out.
You should!  It's worth watching.
